wikipedia_page.main: John Paskin Taylor (18 March 1928 – 9 March 2015) was a British field hockey player who competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was a member of the British field hockey team that won the bronze medal. He played one match as forward.

response: *John Paskin Taylor (1928–2015), British Olympic field hockey player
